text:
Ah, potato butter...!
Is everyone going to eat...!?

Wait,
That stall is no good.
You should go to that other stall.

...?
The prices seem the same though...

At that one, you can use all the salt,
butter, pepper, and kimchi you want.

Aha~
Madoka-senpai, the potato butter expert~~

Even though we came for New Year's shrine visit,
It seems like all we're doing is eating...!
